TopicTitle: Phase angle and ejection angle calculator.

Articles.Content:
There is a great little calculator here: http://ksp.olex.biz/

NOTE: It doesn't take into account inclinations and eccentricities, so I wouldn't use it for Eeloo, and it only does the planets, not any natural satellites.

Also, I didn't make this, but this is a really great tool that I want to share.
It's well known by the community already.

It's well known by the community already.

Really? I've been on the community for a while and just found out about it via a HOCgaming video.
